name: Da Varanda #006
description: 1 week, an apartment balcony and a camera. This series of photos is being produced from the balcony of my apartment. For 1 week, I will photograph the life that I can see from up here on the 10th floor. This is the sixth photo, size 3008 x 2000 px - ISO 400 | 18mm | f/22 | 6 sec. All will be minted in 100 editions at a low price and after the sale period, those that are not sold will be burned.
